rules_text:
When Hand of Consequence enters, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if your fealty to Swamps is five or greater, transform Hand of Consequence. [i](Each Swamp you control counts towards your fealty to Swamps.)[/i]
flavor_text2: [i]“Skittering scarabs. Scorching sun. Swirling sands. Infinite possibilities, one inevitable truth—today, you will die.”[/i]
